str2: A primary particle; but, and, etc.
If. A primary particle of conditionality; if, whether, that, etc.
Probably adverb of comparative from hos; which how, i.e. In that manner.
A Christian. From Christos; a Christian, i.e. Follower of Christ.

parse: Verb - Present Imperative Middle or Passive - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To be ashamed, be put to shame. From aischos; to feel shame.
A primary particle; but, and, etc.

parse: Verb - Present Imperative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: To glorify, honor, bestow glory on. From doxa; to render glorious.
A deity, especially the supreme Divinity; figuratively, a magistrate; by Hebraism, very.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.
Name, character, fame, reputation. From a presumed derivative of the base of ginosko; a 'name'.
